attributes.action: Allow Ghurka's (of any age) who have bravely served this country to retire in this country if they so wish
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that these brave soldiers deserve the benefits of being granted citizenship for the hard work and effort they put in for this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
